DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of paritaprevir/ritonavir/ombitasvir with ribavirin used for participants infected with chronic hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype 2 in daily practice in Japan.
DOC.brief_title: Drug Use-Results Survey in Participants Infected With Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 2
DOC.criteria: HCV genotype 2 participants treated with paritaprevir/ritonavir/ombitasvir plus ribavirin in daily practice. Participants who have been previously treated with paritaprevir/ritonavir/ombitasvir and ribavirin.
